about_the_game:
Year 4 Pass!

This pass unlocks all the DLC that we will release during hexceed's fourth year! We will be releasing a new DLC every 2 months, each containing a new world to complete. 6 new worlds to explore! Over 700 levels to complete!

Buy the pass now and get each DLC as it releases!

Contents

Although each DLC will be available for purchase individually, this year 4 pass will shave 16% off the total price.
Here is a breakdown of the DLCs included:
  • 1 - Rubrum (Feb 2024)
  • 2 - Flavum (Apr 2024)
  • 3 - Viridis (Jun 2024)
  • 4 - Caeruleum (Aug 2024)
  • 5 - Fuscus (Oct 2024)
  • 6 - Violaceum (Dec 2024)

This pass unlocks all the DLC that we will release during hexceed's fourth year! We will be releasing a new DLC every 2 months, each containing a new world to complete. 6 new worlds to explore! Over 700 levels to complete!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

  • Processor: Intel i3

  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: hexceed - Year 4 Pass

short_description: This is your pass to 6 exciting new worlds to complete in hexceed! With 700+ levels to complete!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Dutch, Finnish, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
